name: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2004: A Century of Flight
name_original: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2004: A Century of Flight
description:
Microsoft Flight Simulator 2004: A Century of Flight is a simulation game developed by Microsoft Game Studios. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Microsoft Studios. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Microsoft Flight Simulator 2004: A Century of Flight on PC.
